com.aurel.track.dao

Interface WorkflowConnectDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TWorkflowConnectPeer

    public interface WorkflowConnectDAO
    DAO for WorkflowConnect object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.Integer objectID)
      Deletes a screenConfig from the TScreenConfig table Is deletable should return true before calling this method
      void deleteByIssueType(java.lang.Integer issueTypeID)
      Delete the configurations for given node
      void deleteByProjects(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> projectIDs)
      Delete all configs with projects if the projects is null - delete all all configs which have project set
      void deleteByProjectType(java.lang.Integer projectType)
      Delete all configs withe given projectType pk if the project pk is null - delete all all configs which have projectType set

      • loadAllByIssueType

        java.util.List<TWorkflowConnectBean> loadAllByIssueType(java.lang.Integer issueType,
                                                      java.lang.Integer projectType,
                                                      java.lang.Integer project)
        Gets all the TWorkflowConnectBean for issueType, projectType and project
        Parameters:
        issueType - can be null, in this case the result it is not filtered by issueType
        projectType - include into filtering even if null
        project - include into filtering even if null
        Returns:

      • loadAllByProjectType

        java.util.List<TWorkflowConnectBean> loadAllByProjectType(java.lang.Integer projectType,
                                                        boolean excludeWithIssueType)
        Gets all the TWorkflowConnectBean by projectType
        Parameters:
        projectType - if specified filter by projectType otherwise only be sure to not to be null (all projectType specific configurations)
        excludeWithIssueType -
        Returns:
